Plot: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.
Title: RoboCop 3
Writer: Edward Neumeier (characters), Michael Miner (characters), Frank Miller (story), Frank Miller (screenplay), Fred Dekker (screenplay)
Actors: Robert John Burke, Mario Machado, Remy Ryan, Jodi Long
